changelog:
1. Added file system safety checks - Added hasFileFunctions and hasIsFile variables to handle different executors
2. Enhanced authentication system - Changed SaveKey = true and added multiple valid keys for better UX
3. Added character monitoring - Automatic reapplication of WalkSpeed/JumpPower on respawn
4. Extended speed ranges - WalkSpeed up to 500, JumpPower up to 500
5. Added new features - Hip Height slider and Noclip toggle
6. Improved script executor - Better error messages and input clearing
7. Enhanced favorites system - Proper file handling and duplicate prevention
8. Better ScriptBlox integration - Multiple API endpoint fallbacks
9. Improved UI organization - Added sections and better labels
10. Auto-refresh news system - Updates every 5 minutes automatically
